extension.description:
Kodi PVR programme reminder ===========================
A simple reminder pop-ups when a programme that has been selected from Kodi's EPG.
Features - Simple PVR reminder, using times and programme info from Kodi's EPG - Choose which programme by selecting "Remind Me" from the context menu in Kodi's EPG
Notes and Current limitations - Only one reminder can be scheduled at a time. - At the moment PVR Reminder is only limited to 24hrs.
Future features - Add EPG data to reminder - Multiple reminders - Add padding to reminder - And more....
Credits - Thanks to remigius who provided the current Alarmclock addon - to which the PVR reminder is based on.
